titles.title: SF99 All creatures of our God and King

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v3 c1 v5 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
All creatures of our God and King,
lift up your voice and with us sing,
alleluiah, alleluiah!
O burning sun with golden beam,
and silver moon with softer gleam:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O rushing wind that art so strong,
and clouds that sail in heaven along,
O praise him, alleluiah!
O rising morn, in praise rejoice;
ye lights of evening, find a voice:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O flowing water, pure and clear,
make music for your Lord to hear,
sing 'Praise him, alleluiah!
O fire, so masterful and bright,
giving to all both warmth and light:

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Dear mother earth, who day by day
Unfolds rich blessings on our way,
O praise him, alleluia!
The flowers and fruits that bloom and grow,
Let them his glory also show:

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
And all who are of tender heart,
forgiving others, take your part,
sing 'Praise him, alleluiah!
All who long pain and sorrow bear,
praise God. and on Him cast your care:

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
And now, most kind and gentle death,
Waiting to hush our latest breath,
O praise him. alleluia!
You homeward lead the child of God,
And Christ the Lord the way has trod:

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Let all things their Creator bless,
and worship him in humbleness;
O praise him, alleluiah!
Praise, praise the Father, praise the Son,
and praise the Spirit, Three in One:

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
O praise him, O praise him,
alleluiah, alleluiah, alleluiah.
